tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Prashant is exceptionally competent and professional in all spheres of dental treatment. Being 75 years old my dental treatment appeared very complicated to me.However Dr Prashant and his Team performed in exemplary manner in fixing dental implants and bridges to my  full satisfaction.
He grasps the problem efficiently and discusses various options with the patient and mutually decides the best option.Has good hand and one feels comfortable. Dr Sonali working with him is also quite competent.I recommend Dr Prashant Nanda strongly for dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been to a few dentists in the past and I have gotten my tooth extracted in thr past as well. With Dr Nanda, I had the same apprehension and fear as I did with every other dentist I have visited. He spoke in a very calm manner and explained everything in detail. My wife and I had alot of queries which he patiently answered. When it came to extracting the tooth instead of using pliers and yanking the tooth out, he used a set of different tools which made the whole process less scary. ** ** ****** ************* *** takes care of the small discomforts which his patients face.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I absolutely recommend Dr. Prashant Nanda. I was warmly greeted and made comfortable right from the beginning. I went for a second opinion about my gum surgery. He patiently heard my concern and gave his diagnosis which was right on point. Dr Prashant has Excellent attention to details. He was easily able to identify the reason for my receding gums and suggested the same procedure which I was expecting to hear. He took ample of time to educate me with the right practises I should follow to keep my dental hygiene, got to know more about my family and my work. He values long term relationship and believe me if you are looking for a dentist, he is the only doctor you will love to see!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Having  dental treatment done by Dr Nanda has been the best ever experience had by me so far. Appointment time was strictly adhered to and there was no waiting. Treatment room was clean and aesthetic. Doctor Nanda attitude was friendly, suave and professional. During my time on his chair, he was very patient with my queries and handled procedure  with total professional competence. Charges were very reasonable.  
   I will recommend him for best experience of dental treatment in Gurgaon. 
  Jagdish Prakash

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was advised dental implant 3 years back but I delayed the procedure due to my apprehension that the procedure would be painful and complicated. However, Dr Sonali Bhattacharya recommended Dr Prashant and assured that he is the best. Dr Prashant was very friendly and carried out the procedure in just about 35-40 minutes. I felt no pain and the entire procedure was over smoothly. I am feeling comfortable and fine . 👍👍👍

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Prashant Nanda is a handsome young man with a pleasing personality. He along with his team of doctors in the Nanda Dental Clinic appear to be   merry everyday and happy 😊😁always type.These surgeons are highly qualified and have excellent professional skills. They extend their services with utmost perfection and give one a painless treatment, and that is one of the reasons for my recommendation ,to all, to visit Nanda Dental Clinic.❤️  (Gurgaon/Delhi)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a long session with dr nanda on 11th october for tooth implants....it took longer tban usual as i hadnt taken the antibiotics he told me to have...hence i had nerve sensitivity and time was spent on anaesthesia repestedly to numb the sensitivity...if id taken the antibiotic then i would  have my implants done in a shorter time....i feel good after the implants now and yesterday dr nanda also removed my stitches of last week.

review: The experience is very pleasant; from my very first visit at the dental clinic, I was made to feel welcome and comfortable both by the friendly competence of the staff and the pleasant environment of the office! Doctor Prashant inspires the utmost confidence by his knowledge, skill and professionalism; My sincere recommendation and reference to all is to go visit Nanda Clinic, if have any dental problem;

review: To start with, he was warm and smiled and checked with me how am I doing the moment he saw me. As I told him I am nervous, he smiled. The process was pain free and he kept complimenting me for being cooperative which kept me encouraged through the process even though I could hear heavy very heavy drilling sound during extraction. Later, he gave me his number and told him to contact him anytime if I have any issues. He explained clearly the Dos & Donts and is easily accessible over mobile for any clarification. Grateful for the entire team of Nanda Dental Clinic.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words
